meanings.definition: A painful swelling on the first joint of the big toe.
meanings.sent1: The bunion on her toe made it hard to wear shoes.
meanings.sent2: She had to buy special shoes to accommodate her bunion.
meanings.sent3: His bunion seemed to have a personality of its own, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The bunion felt like a small rock stuck in her shoe.
meanings.sent5: The bunion throbbed with each step she took.

meanings.definition: A bony bump that forms on the joint at the base of the big toe.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the bunion was a result of pressure on the toe joint.
meanings.sent2: Her grandmother had a large bunion that made walking painful.
meanings.sent3: The bunion looked like a tiny mountain on her toe.
meanings.sent4: The bunion felt like a small pebble under her skin.
meanings.sent5: The bunion protruded noticeably from her foot.

meanings.definition: A deformity of the foot marked by a swollen, protruding bump on the inner side of the foot near the big toe.
meanings.sent1: The bunion caused her foot to look misshapen.
meanings.sent2: He had to undergo surgery to correct the bunion on his foot.
meanings.sent3: The bunion on her foot made her walk like a penguin.
meanings.sent4: The bunion felt like a small balloon filled with water.
meanings.sent5: The bunion on her foot grew larger over time.
